extension.summary: Watch Jamaican Live TV and Radio
extension.description:
Watch Jamaican Live TV and Radio, including TVJ, RETV, JNN, TVJSN, CVTV, RJR94FM, FAMEFM, and HITZ92 FM, POWER 106, MUSIC 99 in one spot. 1Spotmedia is providing live stream and video on demand (VOD). Get the full experience of 1Spotmedia.
This addon is not official. This version is no longer supported or maintained, use the Matrix version.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.description: This addon allows you to change your ip to match your policy rules on asus wrt merlin. Only tested on Raspberry Pi.
